label: Hubspot
description: Arcade tools designed for LLMs to interact with Hubspot

tools.name: AssociateActivityToDeal
tools.description: Associate a single activity object to a deal using HubSpot standard association type.

parameters.name: activity_type
parameters.description: Engagement activity type.

parameters.name: activity_id
parameters.description: The activity object ID

parameters.name: deal_id
parameters.description: The deal ID to associate to

output.description: Associate an activity to a deal

codeExample.tabLabel: Call the Tool with User Authorization

tools.name: AssociateContactToDeal
tools.description: Associate a contact with an existing deal in HubSpot.

parameters.name: deal_id
parameters.description: The ID of the deal to associate the contact with

parameters.name: contact_id
parameters.description: The ID of the contact to associate with the deal

output.description: Dictionary containing the association result

codeExample.tabLabel: Call the Tool with User Authorization

tools.name: CreateCallActivity
tools.description:
Create a call engagement activity with required owner and associations.
Must be associated with at least one of: contact, company, or deal.
Assign to the current user if not specified otherwise.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Short title for the call.

parameters.name: when_occurred
parameters.description: When the call occurred (ISO date format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS).

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: Call direction (INBOUND or OUTBOUND).

parameters.name: summary
parameters.description: Short summary/notes of the call.

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: Call duration in seconds.

parameters.name: to_number
parameters.description: Phone number called to.

parameters.name: from_number
parameters.description: Phone number called from.

parameters.name: associate_to_contact_id
parameters.description: Contact ID to associate this call with.

parameters.name: associate_to_company_id
parameters.description: Company ID to associate this call with.

parameters.name: associate_to_deal_id
parameters.description: Deal ID to associate this call with.

output.description: Details of the call engagement activity created.

summary.value: Discussed project updates and next steps.

codeExample.tabLabel: Call the Tool with User Authorization

tools.name: CreateCommunicationActivity
tools.description:
Create a communication activity for logging communications that are not done via
email, call, or meeting.

This includes SMS, WhatsApp, LinkedIn messages, physical mail, and custom channel
conversations.
Must be associated with at least one of: contact, company, or deal.
The communication will be assigned to the current user.

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: Communication channel type.

parameters.name: when_occurred
parameters.description: When the communication occurred (ISO date format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS).

parameters.name: body_text
parameters.description: Full message content.

parameters.name: associate_to_contact_id
parameters.description: Contact ID to associate this communication with.

parameters.name: associate_to_company_id
parameters.description: Company ID to associate this communication with.

parameters.name: associate_to_deal_id
parameters.description: Deal ID to associate this communication with.

output.description: Details of the communication engagement activity created.

body_text.value: Just following up on our previous conversation.

codeExample.tabLabel: Call the Tool with User Authorization

tools.name: CreateCompany
tools.description:
Create a new company in HubSpot.

Before calling this tool, use Hubspot.GetAvailableIndustryTypes to see valid values.

parameters.name: company_name
parameters.description: The company name (required)

parameters.name: web_domain
parameters.description: The company web domain (e.g., example.com)

parameters.name: industry_type
parameters.description: The company industry type (case-insensitive).

parameters.name: company_city
parameters.description: The company city location

parameters.name: company_state
parameters.description: The company state or province

parameters.name: company_country
parameters.description: The company country

parameters.name: phone_number
parameters.description: The company main phone number

parameters.name: website_url
parameters.description: The company website URL

output.description: Dictionary containing the created company information

codeExample.tabLabel: Call the Tool with User Authorization

tools.name: CreateContact
tools.description: Create a contact associated with a company.

parameters.name: company_id
parameters.description: The ID of the company to create the contact for.

parameters.name: first_name
parameters.description: The first name of the contact.

parameters.name: last_name
parameters.description: The last name of the contact.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: The email address of the contact.

parameters.name: phone
parameters.description: The phone number of the contact.

parameters.name: mobile_phone
parameters.description: The mobile phone number of the contact.

parameters.name: job_title
parameters.description: The job title of the contact.

output.description: Create a contact associated with a company.

codeExample.tabLabel: Call the Tool with User Authorization

tools.name: CreateDeal
tools.description:
Create a new deal in HubSpot.

If pipeline_id is not provided, the default pipeline will be used.

For custom pipelines, deal_stage must be a valid stage ID within
the selected pipeline. If deal_stage is not specified,
the first stage in the pipeline will be used automatically.

It is recommended have already pipeline data available when
planning to call this tool.

parameters.name: deal_name
parameters.description: The deal name (required)

parameters.name: deal_amount
parameters.description: The deal amount/value

parameters.name: deal_stage
parameters.description: The deal stage

parameters.name: deal_type
parameters.description: The deal type.

parameters.name: expected_close_date
parameters.description: Expected close date in YYYY-MM-DD format

parameters.name: pipeline_id
parameters.description: Pipeline id. Use 'default' for default pipeline or pass a pipeline id (integer)

parameters.name: deal_owner
parameters.description: The deal owner user ID

parameters.name: priority_level
parameters.description: Priority level.

parameters.name: deal_description
parameters.description: The deal description

output.description: Dictionary containing the created deal information

deal_description.value: This deal involves the development of a new website for the client.

codeExample.tabLabel: Call the Tool with User Authorization

tools.name: CreateEmailActivity
tools.description:
Create a logged email engagement activity with essential fields including email headers.
Must be associated with at least one of: contact, company, or deal.
The email will be assigned to the current user.

parameters.name: subject
parameters.description: Email subject.

parameters.name: when_occurred
parameters.description: When the email occurred (ISO date format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS).

parameters.name: from_email
parameters.description: Sender email address.

parameters.name: to_email
parameters.description: Primary recipient email address.

parameters.name: body_text
parameters.description: Email body in plain text.

parameters.name: body_html
parameters.description: Email body in HTML format.

parameters.name: from_first_name
parameters.description: Sender first name.

parameters.name: from_last_name
parameters.description: Sender last name.

parameters.name: to_first_name
parameters.description: Primary recipient first name.

parameters.name: to_last_name
parameters.description: Primary recipient last name.

parameters.name: cc_emails
parameters.description: CC recipient email addresses.

parameters.name: bcc_emails
parameters.description: BCC recipient email addresses.

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: Direction the email was sent (EMAIL, INCOMING_EMAIL, FORWARDED_EMAIL).

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Email status indicating the state of the email.

parameters.name: associate_to_contact_id
parameters.description: Contact ID to associate this email with.

parameters.name: associate_to_company_id
parameters.description: Company ID to associate this email with.

parameters.name: associate_to_deal_id
parameters.description: Deal ID to associate this email with.

output.description: Details of the email engagement activity created.

body_text.value:
Dear Recipient,

I hope this email finds you well. Looking forward to our meeting.
Best,
Sender

body_html.value:
Dear Recipient,

I hope this email finds you well. Looking forward to our meeting.

Best,
Sender

codeExample.tabLabel: Call the Tool with User Authorization

tools.name: CreateMeetingActivity
tools.description:
Create a meeting with essential fields including separate date and time.

The start_date and start_time are combined to create the meeting timestamp.
Duration can be specified in HH:MM format.
Must be associated with at least one of: contact, company, or deal.
The meeting will be assigned to the current user.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Meeting title.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Start date (YYYY-MM-DD format).

parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description: Start time (HH:MM or HH:MM:SS format).

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: Meeting duration in HH:MM format (e.g., 1:30 for 1 hour 30 minutes).

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: Meeting location.

parameters.name: outcome
parameters.description: Meeting outcome.

parameters.name: associate_to_contact_id
parameters.description: Contact ID to associate this meeting with.

parameters.name: associate_to_company_id
parameters.description: Company ID to associate this meeting with.

parameters.name: associate_to_deal_id
parameters.description: Deal ID to associate this meeting with.

output.description: Details of the meeting engagement activity created.

codeExample.tabLabel: Call the Tool with User Authorization

tools.name: CreateNoteActivity
tools.description:
Create a note engagement activity with required owner and associations.
Must be associated with at least one of: contact, company, or deal.
Assign to the current user if not specified otherwise.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The note content/body.

parameters.name: when_occurred
parameters.description: When the note was created (ISO date format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS).

parameters.name: associate_to_contact_id
parameters.description: Contact ID to associate this note with.

parameters.name: associate_to_company_id
parameters.description: Company ID to associate this note with.

parameters.name: associate_to_deal_id
parameters.description: Deal ID to associate this note with.

output.description: Details of the note engagement activity created.

body.value: This is a sample note about the recent meeting.

tools.name: GetAllUsers
tools.description:
Get all users/owners in the HubSpot portal.

This tool retrieves a list of all users (owners) in your HubSpot portal,
Useful for user management and assignment operations.

Use this tool when needing information about ALL users in the HubSpot portal.

output.description: Get all users/owners in the HubSpot portal with their names, emails, IDs, and status.

tools.name: GetAvailableIndustryTypes
tools.description:
Get all available industry types for HubSpot companies.

Returns a sorted list of valid industry type values that can be used
when creating companies.

output.description: List of all available industry types for HubSpot companies.

tools.name: GetCallDataByKeywords
tools.description: Search for call activities with associated contacts, companies, and deals.

parameters.name: search_terms
parameters.description: Search phrase or terms to find in CALL properties.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of calls to return. Defaults to 10. Max is 50.

parameters.name: associations_limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of each associated object type to return. Defaults to 10.

parameters.name: truncate_big_strings
parameters.description: Whether to truncate string properties longer than 100 characters. Defaults to False.

parameters.name: next_page_token
parameters.description: The token to get the next page of results. Defaults to None (returns first page of results)

output.description: Retrieve call activity data with associated contacts, companies, and deals.

codeExample.tabLabel: Call the Tool with User Authorization

parameters.name: associations_limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of each associated object type to return. Defaults to 10.

codeExample.tabLabel: Call the Tool with User Authorization

tools.name: UpdateDealStage
tools.description:
Updates a deal's stage with associated contacts, companies, calls, emails,
meetings, notes, and tasks.

Send current_pipeline_id to skip fetching the deal.
If pipeline changes are allowed, updates the stage and HubSpot
may move the deal to another pipeline.

It is recommended have already pipeline data available when
planning to call this tool.

parameters.name: deal_id
parameters.description: The ID of the deal to update

parameters.name: deal_stage
parameters.description: New deal stage ID

parameters.name: associations_limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of each associated object type to return. Defaults to 10.

parameters.name: current_pipeline_id
parameters.description: Current pipeline id for this deal, if already known (skips fetching the deal)

parameters.name: allow_pipeline_change
parameters.description: If true, allows changing the deal's pipeline when the stage belongs to another pipeline

output.description: Updated deal information with associated entities

parameters.name: email_id
parameters.description: The email activity ID to update.

parameters.name: keywords
parameters.description: Keywords to search for email subjects or body text. Provide when email_id is not known.

parameters.name: subject
parameters.description: Updated email subject.

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: Updated email direction.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Updated email status.

parameters.name: body_text
parameters.description: Updated plain-text body.

parameters.name: body_html
parameters.description: Updated HTML body.

parameters.name: when_occurred
parameters.description: Updated email timestamp (ISO format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS).

parameters.name: matches_limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of emails to return when searching by keywords. Defaults to 5. Max is 20.

output.description: Update an email activity by ID or list matching emails when searching by keywords.

tools.name: WhoAmI
tools.description:
Get current user information from HubSpot.

This is typically the first tool called to understand the current user context.

Use this tool when needing information about the current user basic HubSpot information.
and the associated HubSpot portal.

output.description: Get current user information.

codeExample.tabLabel: Call the Tool with User Authorization

documentationChunks.content: The Arcade Cloud Platform offers a default [Hubspot auth provider](/references/auth-providers/hubspot). If you use it, there's nothing to configure. Your users will see `Arcade` as the name of the application requesting permission.

summary:
Arcade Toolkit for HubSpot enables seamless integration and interaction with HubSpot's CRM functionalities, allowing developers to leverage various activities and data management tools for enhanced customer relationship management.

**Capabilities**
- Create, update, and manage companies, contacts, and deals within HubSpot.
- Log and associate various engagement activities such as calls, emails, meetings, and more.
- Retrieve detailed information about users, deals, and associated data effectively.
- Access industry types and manage user assignments efficiently.

**OAuth**
- Provider: Unknown
- Scopes: crm.objects.companies.read, crm.objects.contacts.write, crm.objects.deals.read, oauth, sales-email-read

**Secrets**
- No existing secrets.
